projects.name: JyotChat-V1
projects.stack: Next.js, FastAPI, Supabase, OpenAI API, Cohere API, Pinecone, Docker, Azure Container Registry, Azure App Services, Llama Index
projects.theWhat: JyotChat-V1 is a scalable AI-powered chat platform...
projects.theWhy: The project aimed to create a conversational AI app with a massive user base...
projects.theHow: We utilized Next.js for the front end and FastAPI for backend services...
projects.challenges: Handling over 1M users simultaneously required advanced optimization...
projects.keyMotivators: Scaling and performance were primary motivators in the design...
projects.resultsAndLearning: The platform showed a significant engagement boost and high user retention...

projects.name: JyotChat-V2
projects.stack: Next.js, Pinecone Assistant API, Docker, Azure Container Registry, Azure App Services
projects.theWhat: An upgraded version of JyotChat with Pinecone Assistant...
projects.theWhy: To enhance user engagement by offering more personalized AI interactions...
projects.theHow: Used Pinecone for real-time vector search and Azure for deployment...
projects.challenges: Optimizing AI responses while ensuring lower latency...
projects.keyMotivators: Improving user experience and system performance...
projects.resultsAndLearning: The newer version saw improved performance and user interaction metrics...
